mapper.select: SELECT dpinfoimg.id, dpinfoimg.display_info_id, finfo.id AS file_id, finfo.file_name, finfo.save_file_name, finfo.content_type, finfo.delete_flag, finfo.create_date, finfo.modify_date FROM display_info_image dpinfoimg, file_info finfo WHERE dpinfoimg.file_id = finfo.id AND dpinfoimg.display_info_id = #{displayInfoId}
